title: One Piece: Why the Skypiea Arc Is More Important Than You Think
author: GameRant Editorial
description: An analysis arguing that the Skypiea arc holds the key to many of One Piece's secrets and introduces the series' grander themes to audiences, including discussion of the Ordeal system.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Skypiea Arc

title: Revisiting Skypiea: Essential Episodes and Underrated Gems in One Piece's Sky Island Arc
author: ChibiBytes
description: A retrospective look at the Skypiea Arc, highlighting essential episodes and underrated moments that fans should pay attention to during a rewatch.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers the entire Skypiea Arc with spoilers

title: One Piece – Skypiea Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: Comprehensive recap of the Skypiea Arc with thematic analysis, trope identification, and discussion of major plot points including the Ordeal Gates.

title: One Piece Diaries #21 – Skypiea Arc #1
author: Comicon.com
description: Personal reactions and commentary on the Skypiea Arc including the Ordeals and character moments, written as a diary-style first-time viewing experience.

title: One Piece Episode 159-160 Reaction

description: Reaction video covering episodes 159-160 of One Piece, focusing on the Ordeal Gates and the crew's split journey through Upper Yard.

title: [ONE PIECE] Skypiea - The Most Important Arc in the History of One Piece
